Module lanat
Package lanat.parsing.errors

Class ErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
lanat.parsing.errors.ErrorHandler
public class ErrorHandler extends Object
Handles all errors generated by the parser and tokenizer.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final @NotNull List<@NotNull Token>
    tokens
    The list of tokens that were parsed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor
    Description
    ErrorHandler(@NotNull Command rootCommand)
    Creates a new error handler for the specified command.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getAbsoluteCmdTokenIndex()
    Returns the index of the current command in the token list.
    @NotNull Token
    getRelativeToken(int index)
    Returns the token at the specified index, offset by the current command's token index (absoluteCmdTokenIndex).
    @NotNull Command
    getRootCommand()
    Returns the root command that this error handler is handling errors for.
    @NotNull List<@NotNull String>
    handleErrors()
    Handles all errors and returns a list of error messages generated.
